channel.title: Binary Search on Alexander Makarov
channel.description: Recent content in Binary Search on Alexander Makarov

item.title: Finding Bug with Binary Search
item.description: Once there’s a way to reproduce the issue we need to find code which caused it. Sometimes we are totally stuck for day feeling more and more depressed and, in the end, unable to think clearly. Luckily, there’s a systematic approach to find bug even if you have no idea what caused it and even where to set a breakpoint for proper debugging. This approach is known as binary search.
